channel.title: SOLVED Qubes-Whonix 14 instead of 15 gets installed following the HowTo
channel.description:
What have I done? - clean Qubes install without whonix templates - I updated dom0 - I tried to install Qubes-Whonix 15 by following the official HowTo
Expected result: whonix 15 templates should be installed Actual result: whonix 14 templates were installed
So, is there any step missing in the documentation? Like specifying which whonix version to install?
https://forums.whonix.org/t/14-15-issues-uninstall-install/7652/2?u=55paqdgc4 solved it.

item.title: SOLVED Qubes-Whonix 14 instead of 15 gets installed following the HowTo
item.dc:creator: 55paqdgc4
item.description:
What have I done?

  • clean Qubes install without whonix templates
  • I updated dom0
  • I tried to install Qubes-Whonix 15 by following the official HowTo

Expected result: whonix 15 templates should be installed
Actual result: whonix 14 templates were installed

So, is there any step missing in the documentation? Like specifying which whonix version to install?

14-15 Issues ? uninstall-> install solved it.

Read full topic
item.source: SOLVED Qubes-Whonix 14 instead of 15 gets installed following the HowTo
